channel.title: Donate on HJS Educational Funding
channel.description: Recent content in Donate on HJS Educational Funding

item.title: Thank you
item.description: Thank you! Your generous donation will be used to fund educational opportunities for underpvileged students, and help them fulfill their dreams and aspirations. HJS Educational Funding is a registered 501(c)(3) non-profit and donations are tax-deductible.
